description: An Apple HealthKit workout sample that represents a workout or episode of physical activity. This schema does not capture links created using the `addSamples` method of HKWorkout.

activity_name.description: This should correspond to the constant for the desired type of activity, e.g. HKWorkoutActivityTypeCycling, not the integer value associated with that constant

effective_time_frame.description: The time frame when this sample occurred. When the HKSample `startDate` and `endDate` values are different, we recommend using the `time_interval` time frame property, and when they are the same, we recommend using the `date_time` time frame property.

kcal_burned.description: The number of calories burned in the workout.

metadata.description: An array of extra information describing this sample.
